nodes.bodyText: Here and in all the other tests and samples; can we avoid callingModelBridgeInternal.setFeedOptionsMaxItemCount() and instead do the byPage() conversion?

We cannot, because these ones use AsyncDocumentClient - which is an internal type. Public APIs byPage() are not available here. So that's why we used ModelBridgeInternal class.
See this: https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/pull/10146/files/9c29922a7eea87190f77de4548325a4890364a9b#diff-6ca349d07cccd84853fafeaecacab723R30
But I agree, going forward, we should change the examples itself to use CosmosClient and public APIs.  But that is a much bigger change across SDK.
